entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
